item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Mary Ann Shaffer
item.description: "That's what I love about reading: one tiny thing will interest you in a book, and that tiny thing will lead you to another book, and another bit there will lead you onto a third book. It's geometrically progressive - all with no end in sight, and for no other reason than sheer enjoyment." -- Mary Ann Shaffer

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Sandra Dallas
item.description: "When it's raining pudding, hold up your bowl." -- Sandra Dallas

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Edith Hahn Beer
item.description: "I thought: Now I am like Dante. I walk through hell, but I am not burning." -- Edith Hahn Beer

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Beth Hoffman
item.description: "When a chapter of your Life Book is complete, your spirit knows its time to turn the page so a new chapter can begin. Even when you're scared or think you're not ready your spirit knows you are. " -- Beth Hoffman

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Kimberley Freeman
item.description: "There are two types of women in the world, Beattie, those who do things and those who have things done to them." -- Kimberley Freeman

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Jennifer McMahon
item.description: "And, as Rhonda told the story, she thought: this is how the past gets passed down. This is how memories are made. Half-invented, embellished, given a touch of whimsy." -- Jennifer McMahon
